title: Pixel 2 keeps crashing
content: All of a sudden my phone went black. I plugged it in an got the battery charge icon but then it went black then the icon again and to black. I powered it up while still plugged in and it came on for a minute then crashed and did the same icon flash. I powered it, same crash and icon flash.  It wonâ€™t stay on long enough to advance troubleshoot.
